Dec 16 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC AVV.L:: *AVEVA GROUP PLC - UPDATE RE CLEARANCES & EXPECTED CLOSING TIMETABLE *AVEVA - UPDATE ON PROGRESS OF PROPOSED ACQUISITION OF OSISOFT *AVEVA - HAS NOW RECEIVED ALL ANTITRUST AND REGULATORY CLEARANCES REQUIRED AHEAD OF COMPLETION OF OSISOFT ACQUISITION *AVEVA - ANTITRUST CLEARANCE IN AUSTRIA IS EXPECTED ON 18 DECEMBER 2020 *AVEVA - REVIEW PROCEDURE FOR ANTITRUST APPROVAL IN BRAZIL IS ONGOING AND CLEARANCE IS EXPECTED BY END OF JANUARY 2021. *AVEVA - REVIEW PROCEDURE OF CFIUS ONGOING & APPROVAL EXPECTED, IF FULL PERIOD IS REQUIRED & NO FURTHER ACTION IS NEEDED, TO BE RECEIVED AROUND FEB 1 2021


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 16-DEC-202007:00:04 GMT
